notes: Verified: World struct in world.rs with 8 HashMap property tables, TileMap, alive HashSet, pending_deaths Vec, rng StdRng, events EventLog
Verified: Entity(pub u64) with Hash, Eq, PartialEq, Clone, Copy. No raw u64 misuse.
Verified: Tick(pub u64) defined. All Event variants include tick: Tick. No cross-casting.
Verified: No system imports another. No message passing. No inter-system traits. All communication via World.
Verified: Sequential tick loop in main.rs. No threads/async/parallel iterators. Deterministic phase order.
Verified: World::spawn() returns Entity, monotonic IDs, inserts into alive set.
Fixed: eating.rs now pushes Event::Died before pending_deaths.push(food). Combat already correct.
Verified: World::despawn() removes from alive + all 8 property tables. Only run_death calls despawn.
Verified: All 4 iterating systems filter pending_deaths.contains(&entity).
Verified: All 5 systems are pub fn run_*(world: &mut World, tick: Tick). No struct/trait methods.
Verified: src/systems/ exists. One run_* per file. mod.rs re-exports all. No system outside src/systems/.
Verified: All systems collect-then-apply. get_mut() with if let Some(). No unwrap().
Verified: No inter-system imports, channels, shared traits, or cross-calls.
Verified: Phase 1 placeholder comment exists, runs first. No environment systems yet.
Verified: Phase 2 runs after Phase 1. run_hunger called here.
Verified: Phase 3 placeholder exists, runs after Phase 2. No decision systems yet.
Verified: Phase 4 runs after Phase 3. run_wander, run_eating, run_combat called here.
Verified: Phase 5 runs after Phase 4. run_death is last system call.
Verified: validate_world(&world) called after Phase 5, gated by #[cfg(debug_assertions)].
Verified: Every system in exactly one phase. External state changes in Phase 4, consequences in Phase 5. Comments document phases.
Verified: All 5 systems follow all 6 steps (file, signature, mod.rs, main.rs call, unit test, builds).
Verified: All 8 property tables follow all 5 steps (struct, field, despawn remove, validate check, init).
Fixed: wander now emits Event::Moved, hunger now emits Event::HungerChanged. All 6 variants have tick: Tick. Lethal/non-lethal ordering correct.
Verified: EventLog ring buffer in events.rs. Default 10,000. Configurable. Overwrites oldest. push/iter/recent API.
Verified: Event enum with 6 variants, all include tick: Tick. Died variant exists. Pushed via world.events.push().
Fixed: eating.rs now pushes Event::Died before pending_deaths.push(food). All event ordering correct.
Verified: TileMap in tile_map.rs. Flat Vec<T> arrays. y*width+x indexing. Stores width/height. No HashMap.
Verified: get_terrain, set_temperature exist. Bounds checking. No direct Vec indexing in systems.
Verified: data/ with creatures.kdl, items.kdl, terrain.kdl. KDL format. kdl crate in Cargo.toml.
Verified: loading.rs parses KDL, maps to entity spawns. No code changes needed for new creature types. No unwrap on parsing.
Verified: world.rng is StdRng. new_with_seed(seed). All systems use world.rng. No thread_rng/OsRng. Determinism tests pass.
Verified: src/rng.rs exists. create_rng(seed) returns StdRng. Single RNG source enforced.
Verified: components.rs has Position, Hunger, Health, CombatStats, Speed, Icon, Name, Nutrition. No property structs in system files.
Verified: hunger.rs exists. run_hunger with correct signature. Increases hunger. Skips pending_deaths. Collect-then-apply. 3 unit tests.
Verified: wander.rs exists. run_wander with correct signature. Moves via world.rng. Skips pending_deaths. Collect-then-apply. 4 unit tests.
Verified: eating.rs exists. run_eating with correct signature. Reduces hunger. Skips pending_deaths. Collect-then-apply. 4 unit tests.
Verified: combat.rs exists. run_combat with correct signature. Resolves combat. Skips pending_deaths. Collect-then-apply. Uses world.rng. 4 unit tests.
Verified: death.rs exists. run_death with correct signature. Drains pending_deaths, calls despawn. Last in Phase 5. 4 unit tests.
Verified: mod.rs exists with pub mod for all 5 systems.
Verified: All 5 systems have unit tests. All use World::new_with_seed(42). Spawn + populate + run + assert.
Verified: tests/invariants.rs exists. 6 tests: zombie checks, entity count conservation, multi-tick runs, seeded RNG.
Verified: tests/determinism.rs exists. 5 tests: same seed comparison, per-tick comparison, multiple seeds, dense combat.
Verified: validate_world in world.rs. Called in main loop with #[cfg(debug_assertions)]. Checks all 8 tables against alive. Panics on violation.
Verified: No .unwrap() in system code. All lookups use if let Some or filter_map with ?. No logging for missing entries.
Verified: No utils.rs or helpers.rs. Shared helpers (spawn, despawn) are impl World methods.
Verified: Systems use filter_map with ? to skip entities missing from secondary tables. No warnings logged.
Verified: No trait definitions in system files. No abstraction layers.
Verified: No system registry. No dynamic dispatch. Direct function calls in main.rs.
Verified: No mpsc/crossbeam channels. No queues or mailboxes. EventLog is observational only.
Verified: No .remove() on property tables outside World::despawn(). Test-only .remove() calls don't count.
Verified: Each system file has exactly one pub fn run_*. No re-exports.
Verified: No static mut, lazy_static!, or thread_local! for simulation state.
Verified: No unsafe in simulation code. Only font.rs FFI (approved).
Verified: No thread_rng(), OsRng, or unseeded RNG anywhere.
Verified: No Vec<Event> used for event storage. All events go through EventLog ring buffer.
Verified: All property tables use HashMap<Entity, T>. No BTreeMap or alternatives.
Verified: No thread::spawn, async, rayon, or parallel iteration in simulation loop.
Not yet applicable: World has 8 HashMap fields (threshold: 25).
Not yet applicable: Main loop has 5 system calls (threshold: 30).
Not yet applicable: 5 system files (threshold: 15).
Verified: FontRenderer in font.rs. FreeType rasterizes ASCII 32-126. R8Unorm atlas. Shelf-packing. freetype-rs dep.
Verified: text.wgsl exists. Vertex shader with projection matrix. Fragment shader: R8Unorm sampling, sRGB-to-linear, BT.709 luminance, kitty contrast, premultiplied alpha.
Verified: fontconfig FFI via #[link]. Queries family/file/hinting/hintstyle. Fallback chain. Hardcoded path fallback. Hinting maps to FreeType flags.
Verified: GpuState in main.rs. Wulfaz title. Resize handling. Scale factor re-rasterization. Gruvbox Dark #282828. sRGB-to-linear. Escape/close exit.
Verified: FontRenderer::new with device/queue/format/size/scale. prepare() returns vertex count. render() draws. Dynamic vertex buffer. '?' fallback. Zero-dim skip. Monospace grid.
Verified: render.rs exists. render_world_to_string and render_status read &World. Entity icons overlay terrain. Read-only.
Verified: All 21 required files exist.
Verified: All 9 required dependencies in Cargo.toml (wgpu, winit, pollster, env_logger, log, freetype-rs, bytemuck, kdl, rand).
Verified: Tick loop in main.rs. Phases 1-5 in order. run_death last. Debug validation after Phase 5. Phase comments present.
